segments.text: This kitchen drawing captures a moment of everyday life gone wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The adult is facing away, totally unaware of the flood from the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water cascades over the edge, soaking everything below.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot in the puddle makes me worry she'll slip.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes are stacked neatly on the counter, waiting their turn.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The open cabinets reveal the cookie jar full of treats.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the boy climbing for them is in real danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That stool is leaning precariously backward.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's holding a plate like he might drop cookies everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl below looks so expectant, palm up.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're conspiring quietly while mom dries plates.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The contrast with the serene garden view is striking.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope nothing bad happens in this scene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It feels like a snapshot of innocence and hazard mixed.
segments.speaker: PAR
